products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Topaz Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades. This blue vertical blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom or kitchen as it is moisture resistant and colourful. Product id: sdb-vtb0593 fabric colour: topaz blue material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes unilux pvc blackout topaz blue 89mm vertical blind in blue.

products.title: Unilux Powder Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: A durable soft pvc fabric which can be wiped clean. Ideal for kitchens and bathrooms. Available in other colours. Unilux powder blue vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Unilux Powder Blue (Moisture Resistant)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm fabric composition: pvc louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
